name: The Frontier Outskirts VR
detailed_description:
Virtual reality game for HTC Vive. Fight against massive amount of cyborgs, droids and machines. Choose your favorite and most effective weapon & beam sword and enjoy the true power. Complete whole campaign to unlock all weapons and reach the top. You are also able to play custom match, so you can clearly enjoy the massive waves of biomechanic enemies. Dominate the skies and become one of the aces of universe. The game is in the Early Access. Please read carefully Early Access information on TFO Store page.



In the current Alpha Version
  • massive battles with cyborgs, droids and robots
  • plenty weapons, beam swords and abilities
  • player movement support by HTC Vive controllers
  • locomotion movement system
  • great battle-field experience
  • slow-motion actions
  • we listen to the community



  • Mixamo [characters & animations]
  • Unity 3D [lighting, environment & Unity Assets]
  • Matt's Creations studio [models, environment, lighting, music, programming, sounds]



We plans a lot of great features to make your experience even better. The features like VR Character, Space battles and multiplayer will be available this year. Updates will also include many more maps, new collection of weapons, spaceships and many more features.
Please check the recent updates to get more information.

short_description: Make your dreams come true. Become a true hero with special abilities and enjoy incredible futuristic battles at the frontier in a cold enviroment or in the infinite universe. Master your skills to eliminate your enemies effectively and quickly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual core 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.07 GHz
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
